OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHAMBER OF COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY - INFORMATION FOR SMALL BUSINESS

Desc.entry: Provides businesses with information and advice on clients, customers and suppliers. Offers advice on health and safety and import and export regulations, as well as offering legal advice to businesses. The Chamber offers training on all aspects of business. Offers representation for local companies. Company Limited by Guarantee no 64569. Also offers full time staff recruitment.

Pubs.entry: Newsletter; First for Business, magazine, E-Newsletter
